subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Ski Jumping
lead_paragraph: In a sport where many jumpers retire by the time they reach their 30s, Noriaki Kasai, 41, is taking part in a record-tying seventh Winter Games.
snippet: In a sport where many jumpers retire by the time they reach their 30s, Noriaki Kasai, 41, is taking part in a record-tying seventh Winter Games.
